website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use tool for quickly disassembling pallets without busting up the planks.
pros: Can be used on decks and docks
Durable build with a handle for comfort
Allows you to break apart pallets in under 5 minutes
cons: Some complaints of it not working as promised, and that it is a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: best. Tool. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: If anyone gives this thing anything less than 5 stars, they are either too dumb to operate a simple tool, or too weak. This thing is absolutely amazing! Minimal effort to operate, incredibly sturdy, and breaks down any size pallet without a single break!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: The right tool for the job.
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave a lot of reviews, but this great tool deserves one. For breaking down pallets and not destroying the wood this is THE TOOL!!! I have broken down several types of pallets with this tool and every time it has amazed me with the results over every other method I have seen. The only advise I can give is try to center the swiveling plates on the board you are going to remove, and do the outside boards first and then the center.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O

customer_reviews.title: Thor's Hammer for a pallet
customer_reviews.text: I've sawed, I've pried and I've cried over pulling pallets apart and this behemoth says no more tears. The build quality of this device lends itself to something from a road warrior movie, thick and heavy. This giant is gentle it will pull the rottenish of pallets apart with little damage as well as the toughest ring shank nail pallet as well. If you want to get all the wood and spend less time pulling nails get this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Health Dept Hero

customer_reviews.title: Only One Complaint
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived yesterday so I've only used it for a short time. I started building pallet wood projects last year and but hated breaking the pallets down. After a year of frustration and water time I broke down and bought this tool. I broke down five pallets yesterday afternoon in about the same amount it would take to break down one. The only boards that broke were already split or in bad shape anyway. It's solid and has a nice weight but I broke down five pallets without wearing myself out. The only complaint I have is that I didn't order this a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pallet buster is a bust
customer_reviews.text: This pallet buster is a total bust. It is only 50% successful at loosening even the weakest of pallets but only boards towards the center where you can get leverage by standing on the pallet and slightly more successful lifting the middle sections of those boards (ends are a problem where only one side of the pallet buster will contact). I’ve tried other pallet busters and they work better. This ones angles seem to be off and make it really hard to leverage boards. This one is only useful inly if lighting the middle sections and cutting the boards off at the ends/sides.
customer_reviews.author: Green Tree

customer_reviews.title: Remember it’s called a pallet buster not saver.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because it does what it says it will do very well, BUT we are reclaiming wood from the pallets for woodworking and this is not helping very much for our purpose if the nails don’t come up with the wood your prying on total blowout on other side if you pry up a little bit and push the slat back down and the nail heads stay up you can pull the nails with a better success rate but for what we’re doing one counter action creates another step and then another step and so on and that’s our experience with it but this thing will tear a pallet apart quickly.
customer_reviews.author: william h.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes pallet disassembly much easier. It's super sturdy and rather heavy. I can take apart pallets in 3 to 4 minutes and save most of all the boards. It used to take twenty or so minutes to take one apart. If you're evern considering one of these, do it! The part at the bottom that presses against the boards has a swivel to it and that makes it easier to save the boards.
customer_reviews.author: The Asthmatic Jedi

customer_reviews.title: This bar is a beast!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is no joke. It may be a little heavy but you need something strong that won’t bend and break after several uses. I can tear apart a pallet in about 3-4 minutes. This bar also went over 4x4’s too. No more broken boards. I start in the middle and lift a few inches. Then go to the edge and pop board up all the way. Then go back to middle and pop board up all the way then move bar over to other end. I place my foot on the end that’s already lose and the nailed end comes right up. It makes breaking down pallets almost enjoyable! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery87

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for removing pressure treated decking
customer_reviews.text: It does just what it says. A special purpose tool but My deck boards were so old that the nails were rusted in and very hard to pull. Normal crow bars and pry bars destroy the wood and break the nails off. The prying action of this tool lifts the plank straight up and doesn't damage the joist or the plank. If you start at one end and work down the plank, it is very quick and clean. My deck is 2" PT lumber, This would work even easier for 1" decking.
customer_reviews.author: st ruell

customer_reviews.title: Save Those Boards...And Your Back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom, who has a healthy obsession with making everything under the sun out of used pallets. She totally loves it. Although I was a bit worried that it would be a tad too hefty for her to use with ease (she's an active 66-year-old, and it is a good 12+ lbs), evidently my concerns were unfounded. According to the pallet queen herself, the pivoting action of the head really does remove more boards intact than her previous method of prying them loose with hammers, crowbars. and a tenacious zeal to turn old, splintery wood into magazine racks and coffee tables.
customer_reviews.author: Bret M. Urick

customer_reviews.title: Great product, so glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerhouse! It’s really heavy, but I was able to rip my deck off all by myself. I am a fairly strong woman, and had no problem popping boards off that were nailed in. I don’t think I could have taken the boards off with a regular long crowbar. Even my handyman was impressed and is going to get one. I get a lot of deliveries on pallets, so I’m going to use that too dismantle them and use them for firewood in my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Girl

customer_reviews.title: happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. This thing looks like it will last forever. I bought it for my brother in law who is learning to build beautiful furniture with pallets (see pic). It makes deconstruction much easier, especially since he has a bad back. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: giftgiver

customer_reviews.title: Even I could use it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprise how easy this makes the pallet disassembly. I purchased this to have my son do the bulk of the work but he showed it to me and I can do it. I think not including the nail remover is just fine. It is a simple process to use a hammer or other heavy object to tap the nails out ... many times pallets are assembled with “screw” nails so using the heavy pallet buster might be more difficult
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Great skid tool
customer_reviews.text: Comes assembled ready to use. Heavy to lift but quite easy to use. You might want to have people stand on corners etc to aid in the process. Broke down about 6 skids in an hour and a half. Does not break the planks unless already splitting to begin with. Team if 4 adults took turns and used free skids. Locally broken down ones are a buck a board. Saved quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best tools I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tools I have purchased. I was hesitant since there were a lot of positive reviews and some negative. For those who are saying it doesn't work, I would be inclined to say they are not using the tool properly. I had no problem dismantling pallets to load into my Tahoe. Granted some of the pallets already had broken slats, if you are careful and use the tool as shown in the videos you will get plenty of usable wood out of a pallet. Would recommend this to anyone who plans to disassemble more than one or two pallets. Oh, and yes it does give you workout.
customer_reviews.author: GRMaddy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! We have been disassembling pallets with a rubber mallet and a crowbar. It took a while, and we got a heavy duty pallet and couldn't get it apart. This thing disassembled it in no time! It's not perfect, we broke a few boards, but we damaged a lot of wood (dents and dings) with our other method. Well worth the money if you plan on disassembling a lot of pallets!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Vestil SKB-DLX Deluxe Steel Pallet Buster with Handle
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed, clever, HD, easy to use, no sharp corners, working as expected, good for pallets and decking, it is made in China yet from good strong steel with full welds, pleasure to work with tool. It is not for everybody as per reviews. Elbow grease is required but results are good. Pros: high percentage of saved boards, much easier then large crowbars, way better control of nails when used in demolition. Cons: the thing at close to 18 lbs and over 40 inch length is way too big to fit in my jeans back pocket next to nail pulling pliers. Hmm,, I suppose nobody is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RoadRunner

customer_reviews.title: Game changer of a product
customer_reviews.text: Don't think twice, just buy it. From someone who makes stuff with pallets struggling thru breaking them down sucked. This is a game changer under 4 minutes to break one down. Easy to use, sturdy and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Felycia Vaona

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this so within an hour of getting it I tried it out. Totally disappointed, it would not pull the boards off, simply split the wood. Its not that its poorly made it just wont work as you would expect, I don't think anything will. I should have known
customer_reviews.author: Ken F. Magdic

customer_reviews.title: This Pallet Buster works pretty darn well
customer_reviews.text: This Pallet Buster works pretty darn well! The first board is a little harder to remove but if you can get the prongs down inside between the boards you can get that first board off with this thing. Otherwise get the first board off anyway you can and then this tool makes the rest easy! I'm a female with only moderate strength so I think anyone can use this.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great demolition tool for pallets
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this tool a couple years ago; after using a saber saw, nail pullers, etc,, this tool makes pallet take apart very easy; Get some leverage and use this tool; by far the best tool I have in taking pallets apart for project wood; nails pull out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Perry K. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I have so far taken 4 pallets apart and I know I did at least 3 in less time than it took me the "old way" (using hammer, pry bar, and crow bar) to do one ...and with LESS effort! I am now waiting for my son to deliver 10 more pallets to me. I did notice in disassembling the first 4 that the "newer" pallets came apart easily and without tearing up. I did split a couple of the boards on the older pallets. The tool is a little pricey but if you plan on doing a lot of pallets I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiltedscroller

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend to those who want to dissemble multiple pallets.
customer_reviews.text: It's works great on regular pallets and other shipping crates. Tight fit, but will work on 4X4s also. It is heavy which to me is a good thing. When using on regular pallets, it pulls the boards off easily and 80% of the time with the nails pulled as well. When a stubborn nail does pull thru there is none to little damage.
customer_reviews.author: EzB

customer_reviews.title: Works 1/2 the time
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pallet buster of any type. Before, I would just use a circular saw and have a lot of waste. I didn't expect this or any other pallet buster to be perfect, but this does not work like videos or description shows or says. In my experience, half of the time, the tool only lifts the entire pallet up instead of separating the slats like it's supposed to. So, working half of the time was not worth the money or extra space it takes up in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: beverly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging/ lack of documentation
customer_reviews.text: The reason I’m giving this 4 stars instead of 5- is because the box was broken in several places apon arrival as well as one whole end was gone.. resulting in the product falling out of the end when picked up. Also due to the fact there was no paperwork or instructions what so ever that came with this product. Other than that, as far as I can tell after a few minutes using it( after looking up instructions) it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: ARiebe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very solid pallet buster. Has weight to it so it's definitely durable. Never used one nor seen one of these before but it was easy to figure out and being a beginner I was able to completely break down 10 pallets within an hour. MUCH easier than using a hammer and crowbar for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: I have an unlimited supply of pallets, and a head full of ideas, but I'm not a young woman.This does exactly what I need it to do, after quite a bit of practice. Once you get the hang of it, you can separate pallets quickly. Weak boards will break, and you have to remove the nails, but this is well worth the investment. I can break down a large pallet in 20 minutes, with no help.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: My only recommendation is to have a smaller pry bar handy for when you need to get started because of small gaps or narrow confines. Once you have space to work, this works wonders. I use it for breaking down pallets, but wish I had known they existed when I demo-ed my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Sharry

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: it works well when you get the hang of it. i got most boards of pallets without breaking. sometimes hard to get the first board off , then seems to work fine. works best on standard pallets, odd pallets are a little more trying.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well constructed tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes it very easy to break down pallets. I have tried other methods and using this tool was by far the easiest. I was able to have a pallet completely broken down into its base components in less than 4 minutes with minimal to no damage to the wood. The tool is heavy duty and very durable. The tool does all of the work. Great buy if you use pallets a lot for wood working or other wood related projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Meany

customer_reviews.title: Built sturdy works well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for pulling up sub flooring and ceiling works well. I would change a couple things, first make the end of the handle a T this will make it easier to handle, also instead of a cheap rubber sleeve on the end have a decent handlebar grip.
customer_reviews.author: masterofnone

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This tool really makes breaking down pallets a breeze. I was working on some hard maple pallets (appx. 5"x10") today and could easily, completely work through each pallet in less than 20minutes. It is an easy tool to use and preserves the integrity of the boards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't split the wood But doesn't work if pallet boards are close
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Only issue it doesn't works if the pallet boards are not enough spaced. You have to use another method the remove the first board. The best thing about this tool is that most of the time it doesn't split the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Yassine

customer_reviews.title: Beats every other method of breaking apart pallets by far!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My husband works in a metal shop and made one similar to this, after having the handle from it break off because of the pressure and strength needed to break pallets apart we saw a video of this particular pallet buster on YouTube. We figured we’d give it a try and I’m so happy we did. It can break apart huge 8x4 pallet boards which we had a huge problem with getting apart before and we used every method... sawzall, hammer and pry bar, etc. With its design it will not break or snap apart like our previous tool. So happy we found this! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TommysMommy

customer_reviews.title: He said it makes taking pallets apart so much easier and fun..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift and he loves it! He has made me a dining room table,matching benches, coffee table and he's currently working on the end tables. He said it makes taking pallets apart so much easier and fun..... yes, he said fun. He says it's not heavy but to me (female) it is! Overall he's very satisfied with this pallet buster and has not had any issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: MariaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Put down the crowbar!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that would make it a 5/5 would be if the teeth are longer. All things considered it just makes pallet breaking way too easy. I just broke 5 pallets in a half hour. It's going to be about another two hours of pulling nails, but I digress. If you want to break pallets. Stop using a hammer and crowbar. This is the way to do it. Seriously. Love the crap out of this thing. The only thing holding me back is the number of pallets I can fit in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Just Josh

customer_reviews.title: No strength required
customer_reviews.text: I’m a weak, and disabled, old woman. I like to make things out of pallet wood; but, I always needed someone else to load, and unload them. And then I needed someone to take them apart for me. I heard about pallet bars , and I wanted to find out more about them. I researched online and found that this model was rated number one for ease of use. The first time that I used it I was able to completely disassemble a pallet in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: diane costa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: ***WOW***. Buy this immediately if you are thinking about breaking apart pallets. This paid for itself on the first board. Very smooth to remove boards and I didn’t split a single board across 8 pallets! Very well constructed and the tings at the end that move help to position the pry bar in many different positions. No pallet is built the same and this has gone through many so far. Loving the was of use! Should have bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Eaton

customer_reviews.title: More sturdy than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is so easy to use! I am now dreaming of all of the pallet projects I can tackle. It is totally worth the cost compared to other pallet tools. The pivoting forks allow you to lift the board up with ease and less chance of damage.
customer_reviews.author: PepperPotz64

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for busting pallets and saving the wood...easy to use once you get the hang of it...would definitely recommend to others interested in using pallet wood
customer_reviews.author: bigaljay

customer_reviews.title: Will save you hours!
customer_reviews.text: This pallet buster is a massive time saver. I have spent countless hours trying to take pallets apart and figure out how not to crack the wood. I can take a complete pallet apart in about 5 minutes with this tool and not crack one board. This is the only one I have been able to find that has movable arms to prevent the pallet from splitting. The price is great and very competitive. I highly recommend. This will save you hours. I no longer dread taking apart the pallets for our DIY projects.
customer_reviews.author: jlundin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Using this thing a lot now now that I've gotten into pallet projects. One of the best thing about this thing is that it makes it a lot faster to take pallets apart now. But the reason for it not getting 5 stars is that it is pretty heavy and so when you lug it around and start taking apart several pallets it starts to drain you because of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bounmee Kanthathin

customer_reviews.title: Makes the pallet breaking easier, is well made and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am a master gardener and we are creating pallet gardens as an option for folks who only have limited garden space. I made the first one with a crowbar and hammer and needed ibuprofen afterwards! The second one I used this marvelous pallet breaker. What a difference! I highly recommend this tool. It is a back and leg saver!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Eckert

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a brute! Thick metal, sturdy construction, joints are welded very well, and it works like a champ. Paint job is also well done. I've used crowbars, prybars, hammers and other boards for a long time to bust up pallets, but this Pallet Buster makes it so incredibly easy. You can bust up a whole pallet is about 2-3 minutes. Nails come out fairly straight, making it easier to remove from the board. If you are breaking down pallets, get this tool. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NATASHA KLUTTS

customer_reviews.title: No returns!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid product, just can't fit small openings for smaller pallets and of course not returnable. Doesn't mention anything about no returns on the description.
customer_reviews.author: jDizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for pulling apart pallets
customer_reviews.text: I definitely prefer to use this method to pull apart my pallets over using a reciprocating saw to cut through the nails. If the boards are fresh and sturdy enough it pulls the boards up and keeps the nails intact so that I dont have to vice grip them out of the stringers later. I've pulled some amazingly beautiful boards so far after running them through my thickness planer. Would definitely recommend this product for its ease of use and effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present, since he likes to build things out of old pallets I get from work. He used to either pull them apart or use a saw to break them down. Now he uses the Pallet Buster and swears it saves him tons of time. Our neighbor has even asked to borrow it and then asked where we got it because he needs one for work. Great tough product that really saves time!
customer_reviews.author: Allison M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Pallet breaker
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product! It can't be just a little hard to handle because it is a bit heavy but once you get it lined up on the pallet the weight of it really helps carry it through to break them loose worth the money
customer_reviews.author: jmmcgee57

customer_reviews.title: Great pallet tool
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool. Breaks down pallets with ease and helps salvage as much as the wood as possible. My twelve year old uses it when helping and does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for "Busting Pallets" - definitely worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy piece of great for "busting pallets". A few downsides that I would recommend as a modification: 1. It's a little heavy for someone of smaller stature. But then again, it does the job and cannot be broken. 2. The forks are bigger than expected and sometimes hard to set at the start when breaking down the pallet. 3. A nail puller built within the design would have been nice. Other than that, this is fantastic and well worth the money. Save me hours over using a hammer and crowbar.
customer_reviews.author: dranger

customer_reviews.title: Oh my God!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best products I ever bought on Amazon!!!! I believe it was specifically made for pallets but I use it to take off my deck floor. I removed my deck floor which was very very old and rotten in about 12 hours I was done with the deck the next day this is an incredible tool.... this too is highly recommended for removing wooden deck floor. And for the price you can't beat it..
customer_reviews.author: amauris sanatana

customer_reviews.title: Works with all pallets except ones where boards are against each other with no space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool....Works perfect with all pallets except the ones with the boards are close together. Then you need to remove one board in order to use it for the rest
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have access to a steady supply ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have access to a steady supply of pallets but I gave up on using them in the past because they were too difficult to disassemble. This product changes all that. I took it out of the box and had my first pallet completely broke down in just a few minutes.I can't wait to start making things with all that good wood that usually just goes to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Does what it suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many way to remove wood pallet. Got this one and it remove easily. Product is sturdy and strong as long as it doesn't rust it should last you forever, very good quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Macesman

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes pulling old deck boards a breeze. Great for pallet dismantling too. I have a bad back and have trouble bending. This tool allows you to stand upright to use. Very well made also. I would recommend buying this product, especially if you plan on replacing decking boards.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Talerico

customer_reviews.title: Reuse wood from pallets
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I wanted to reclaim pallet wood to use in construction projects and it works perfectly. The handle is so long that it’s effortless.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pallet work, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tool, I don't think anyone who works with pallets should not have one of these. I see people here saying it made it alot easier but I didn't think that much easier.. I can pull off boards with one hand on the lever! Don't buy other brand with the bending bars horizontal these are vertical and much much stronger, definitely won't bend. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have. I build things out of pallet wood and this is a GREAT way to make taking them apart. Wish I had found this years ago
customer_reviews.author: Whiplash

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast for taking apart pallets. Was taking me 20 mins each before I got this. Now it never takes more than 3 or 4 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deforest

customer_reviews.title: But I'm still in good condition so I can manage as it is
customer_reviews.text: blasted through a dozen pallets for kindling and some recycling with ease. If I were to re-design this tool, I would make the handle a foot longer for greater leverage. But I'm still in good condition so I can manage as it is, but I can see in a few years, the extra length would be a big advantage. Note however, that the pallets you take apart with this tool has to have at least a 2" space between the boards in order for the 2 forks to slip in. Once you have 1 board pulled out though, its a breeze to blast through the rest of the pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Super tool for taking a pallet apart
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my husband and purchased this pallet buster so he did have to bend over to either cut or pull pallet boards apart. This tool has been great. Finding a tool that was long enough (he is 6'4") and sturdy enough to take pallets apart wasn't that easy. This has been great. It is a bit heavy (for me) and well made. It makes taking a large pallet apart easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: cha292929

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: My 70 year old father with Parkinson's destroyed 6 large 2x4 screwed pallets in 15 min...great product. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Naylor

customer_reviews.title: If you work with Pallets - Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have purchased this last year - I would have saved myself a sore back and tons of frustrations! Perfect tool if you are working with pallets and need to "break" them apart without breaking the material ... and your hands, shoulders, and back! Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRat

customer_reviews.title: Make short work of taking a pallet apart.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for taking shipping pallets apart to reuse the wood for other projects. It only take a few minutes to take one apart. It's still fairly hard work, but much faster and easier that doing it with a pry bar like I used to do. It's quite heavy, but that will mean it should last quite a long time.Very happy with y purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rm62rocket

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Anyone doing pallet furniture/art should have one. It used to take me hours to take my pallets apart, and now I can take one apart in about 10-15 minutes. It has made my hobby with furniture so much more enjoyable! Heavy duty constructed, easy to use. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool for pallet busting.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a must have if you’re trying to bust pallets down to use for crafts. The pivoting feet on the pallet buster help to prevent splintering. The only con would be that the plastic grip on the handle isn’t glued and constantly slips off. But this doesn’t affect or hinder its great use. Definitely worth the money paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: A LONG TIME WAITING!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a pallet buster for some time but there were so many on the market to choose from that I couldn't decide. Well I finally​ made my choice and ordered this one on June 7 and was blown away when it arrived on June 8!!! I opened it and used and let me tell you it is awesome...no more working hard at dismantling pallets for me...I had a pallet dismantled in a matter of minutes!!! Thank you for a wonderful product I love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow !! What a great item! Way over built, heavy duty. Makes fast safe work of breaking down pallets! Minimal back strain. And the best part, it is silent compared to a hammer and flat bar!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyP

customer_reviews.title: A well worth it product.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy-duty product. I have broken apart 20+ pallets and this tool shows no signs of wear. This is a tool that I will keep and use for many years to come. So far this product has saved me a lot of time and energy. Quickly dismantles pallets so that you can re-use the pieces of wood from it without destroying them. An incredible time saver.
customer_reviews.author: dwhite...

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and solid product! Easy to use and saves a lot of time. I trust this will last some time
customer_reviews.author: Kurt T.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive picture
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the claws are not fixed & roll to a position that is almost vertical to the handle with no way to lock or fix them in the original pictured position, I bought this to pry up & move back in place a garden rasied bed side that came apart over winter, this design looks to be less useful for my intended task.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbeen

customer_reviews.title: This tool helps me salvage more usable pallet wood
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes breaking down pallets for salvage much faster and easier with less damage to the wood. Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Testing products

customer_reviews.title: OMG! This tool is SUPER!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I have destroyed or detached a lot of pallets. This thing is just a life saver in every sense. It is also heavy but then I thought - 1. It is not going to break 2. Get a bit of a work out too. Seriously, I have tried A LOT of methods of breaking down pallets for the nice hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: Cobokk

customer_reviews.title: Great pallet buster
customer_reviews.text: Works great, plenty of leverage. Is it heavy ? Yes it's made out of steel. Great design 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally do reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I you are reading this you have a need to break pallets down. You will not regret this purchase. It is built heavy and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Atherton

customer_reviews.title: fast
customer_reviews.text: look if you are looking to recycle pallets this is a must i was able to brake down 6 palettes in no time. i was using a hammer and crowbar i will not do that again best tool for the job know if only i can get someone to make the chicken coop and chairs for me I would be all good
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product did as advertised. Was able to break down full pallets in less than 5 mins with very minimal damage. If there was it was only because of the condition of the pallet. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jscata

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product ,pallet busting at its finest should have got one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Rips pallets apart with minimal effort
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase if you deal with pallets at all. Pulls them apart with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It made dismantling pallets so much easier. I'm not very strong but didnt have a problem at all using it.
customer_reviews.author: Awall

customer_reviews.title: Great innovative tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. It is a little too thick to get in between the planks. But once started, it works great. My 14 year old daughter was able to effectively dismantle several pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practice over time and it gets better.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our son and friend who are starting up a repurposed pallet furniture business. It has saved them time and therefore money! No more beating pallets apart with sledges and hammers! This does save the back, although it still can cause boards to split if you don't go slowly and carefully. The cons would be, it is heavy and somewhat cumbersome to use. Practice over time and it gets better.
customer_reviews.author: H. F.

customer_reviews.title: Saves the back from discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Saw several people using this tool in YouTube videos and it works exactly the way they demonstrated. Well-made and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the middle part of the pallet boards. Seems to break most of the ends.Maybe I'm not using it correctly. If you cut the ends off the pallets and use this to pry up the middles, works great.
customer_reviews.author: dyle51Top Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: ... NO PUN ATTENDED two standard oak pallets apart in like 5 minutes would highly 10 star recommend this to ...
customer_reviews.text: got mine last night and used it this morning 'BUSTED' NO PUN ATTENDED two standard oak pallets apart in like 5 minutes would highly 10 star recommend this to any other wood worker also love amazon my shipment was late by 24 hours and amazon took care of me will keep my prime account going for years to come also highly recommend the prime account to anyone more benefits then what you see. thank you amazon James Ford
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY tool for reclaiming pallet wood!
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT! No tool works in every single application, and this one is no exception. That said, the only place this tool has fallen short, is if the boards are spaced really close together, and even then, I only have to pop one board off by hand, and the rest is a piece of cake. The "feet" being able to pivot provides solid pressure across the entire board, minimizing splits. If your goal is reclaiming pallet wood, look no further, as this STURDY, and well designed tool is the best that I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Kami S. Fleckenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for removing deck boards
customer_reviews.text: I used this tool to remove a couple of dozen 12 ft deck boards. They were fastened with 3 inch ring shank nails. The tool easily pried up the boards. The tool is very sturdy and the mouth will fit over doubled joists. A great time saver!
customer_reviews.author: LA Oley

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. The amount of time you save and less damage to the wood. I think I made my money back with the first day I used it.
customer_reviews.author: EBJ

customer_reviews.title: I also used it to pry 2x4 horizontal rails (were used as workshop bench supports) from open stud walls very easily.
customer_reviews.text: This pallet buster along with a "nail remover' pneumatic gun reduce pallets to usable planks in no time. I also used it to pry 2x4 horizontal rails (were used as workshop bench supports) from open stud walls very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Blackandyellow

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Could write a long narrative, but let’s keep it simple; this pallet buster is AWESOME! Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great, less than 3 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, less than 3 minutes, it will take a pallets apart with little effort at all. Best investment I've made in a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: Made with steel and made to last. With this tool I can break down a pallet in about 5 minutes and I rarely break a board. Whereas before I bought the pallet buster I was breaking 2 or more boards on every pallet while trying to pull them off. I recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pallet deconstruction
customer_reviews.text: Answer for deconstructing a pallet with minimal effort while saving the wood from getting damaged. Taking down a pallet with a crowbar and nail puller would take me a good 40 minutes. I got this yesterday and took down 2 pallets in 20 minutes saving a lot more wood than the old method. Why didn't I buy this sooner?
customer_reviews.author: KWalker

customer_reviews.title: Difficult between boards with smaller gaps.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very heavy and bulky. It was frequently hard to get the forks between some pallet boards but when it did get in there finally, it ripped those bad boys apart with little straining.
customer_reviews.author: Openstory

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very heavy, and does not fit in the space available on the pallet between the cross bars which is what you are trying to do. Now sure what this product weighs. But, it is not easy to use, is very heavy and will not fit in pallet space.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. This is my first time ripping a pallet with this tool and it olny took 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: The Tester

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great device useful to take apart a deck. Great to breakdown pallets
customer_reviews.author: Everett R Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Worked great once I got the knack for it. Took a little muscle but once I figured it out, worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have if you are going to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you are going to dismantle pallets for any reason. I bought it to make dismantling pallets for craft projects easier. With this you get very few broken boards and don't have to spend all day trying to get a pallet taken apart.
customer_reviews.author: Senick00

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all slips off
customer_reviews.text: It don’t work at all , me and my husband tried multiple different ways but it slips off and don’t hold the board to pull I am very disappointed ... have been waiting on getting this to do a project in my Garden But amazon has been good in refunding the purchase thank you amazon as always been great...
customer_reviews.author: SAAS_1972

product_meta.title: Vestil SKB-DLX Deluxe Steel Pallet Buster with Handle, 41",blue
product_meta.description: Size:1 PACKThe Deluxe Pallet Buster is designed for easily disassembling pallets. Articulating head gently removes pallet boards without breaking or splitting the wood. It can also be used for dock board removal.
feature_bullets: Deluxe pallet buster is designed for disassembling pallets easily
Articulating head won't break or split the wood
Features durable construction for added strength and long life
Can also be used for dock board removal
